list.name: 更改
list.comment:
2026/01/18/10:14:17 Fix and optimize!
Fix - the issue with infoPeriod in config.yml not being calculated in seconds. Optimization - Windows 11's CMD line spacing issue. Optimization - The parameters autoReloadError, autoReloadCreate, autoReloadChange, and autoReloadDelete for the language module {0} are recommended to be removed. You can also directly delete the entire language folder to regenerate the configuration files. Optimization - Fixed the issue where deleting the globalRules and localRules folders during runtime would not dynamically generate configuration files.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "JAR 应用程序.Server 1.12.2.executor": "Debug", "JAR 应用程序.Server1.12.2.executor": "Run", "JavaClassFindUsagesOptions.isDerivedClasses": "true", "JavaClassFindUsagesOptions.isFieldsUsages": "true", "JavaClassFindUsagesOptions.isMethodsUsages": "true", "JavaMethodFindUsagesOptions.isSearchForTextOccurrences": "true", "JavaVariableFindUsagesOptions.isSearchForAccessors": "true", "JavaVariableFindUsagesOptions.isSearchForTextOccurrences": "true", "Maven.WorldRulesManage [package].executor": "Run", "Maven.WorldRulesManage [verify].executor": "Run", "Maven.WorldRulesManage package.executor": "Run", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "com.intellij.ml.llm.matterhorn.ej.ui.settings.DefaultAutoModeForALLUsers.v1": "true", "com.intellij.ml.llm.matterhorn.ej.ui.settings.DefaultModelSelectionForGA.v1": "true", "extract.method.default.visibility": "private", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "E:/IDEA/MinecraftPlugins/WorldRulesManage/src/main/resources/localRules/zh_CN", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "project.structure.last.edited": "工件", "project.structure.proportion": "0.0", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.0", "run.code.analysis.last.selected.profile": "pProject Default", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "editor.preferences.completion", "to.speed.mode.migration.done": "true", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true", "应用程序.Main.executor": "Run" } }

task.summary: Fix the null pointer error occurring when the plugin starts!

Fixed the issue where the itemDrop configuration item for radius was ineffective. Radius now allows configuring multiple coordinates in the same world, so the same rules can be applied to multiple coordinates. Warning: After the update, you must update the xyz configuration item in your radius.yml. An example configuration is shown below, or you can delete the entire radius.yml file.
修复了 radius 的 itemDrop 配置项目失效问题。 新增了 radius 同一个世界可以配置多个坐标了，这样相同的规则可以应用到多个坐标当中。 警告：更新后您必须要更新你的 radius.yml 中的 xyz 配置项，配置示例如下，当然你也可以直接删除整个radius.yml的文件。

2025/07/24/22/34/15
Major Update: WorldRulesManage 5.0 Updating to this version requires deleting the previous configuration files and regenerating them. Now supports customizing messages for each world's rules individually. A new option to block entity spawning has been added to the global rules. World-level global rules now support always keeping the weather clear. Finally, the core logic has been optimized.
重大更新 WorldRulesManage-5.0，更新此版本需要删除之前版本的配置文件重新生成。 现在支持给每个世界的规则单独配置提示信息，全局规则中加入了阻止实体生成的选项，世界全局规则中加入了始终天气为晴天，最后优化了核心逻辑。

2025/07/27/01/28/59
Kind Reminder: If version 5.0 already meets the needs of your server, you may ignore this update! WorldRulesManage v5.1 adds support for using whitelist/blacklist in blockBreak and blockPlace to restrict the breaking and placing of specific blocks. Additionally, you will need to update the blockBreak and blockPlace sections in your configuration file. A configuration example has been provided in the update log.
温馨提示：如果v5.0版本已经满足了您的服务器需求，可以忽略本次更新！ WorldRulesManage v5.1 更新了 blockBreak 和 blockPlace 可以使用黑白名单阻止特定方块破坏以及放置，此外您还需要更新配置文件的blockBreak 和 blockPlace配置项，配置示例我已放在更新日志中。

2025/08/21/03:00:15
WorldRulesManage v5.2 — Fixed the error with the itemPickup rule!
WorldRulesManage V5.2 版本修复，itemPickup规则的报错！

2025/08/24/05:02:35
A new fatalInjury option has been added under playerDamage (default: disabled). It does not prevent fatal damage (e.g., falling from a great height, /kill, etc.).
Note: If you do not need the fatalInjury feature, you can ignore this update or update without making any changes. If you are upgrading from v5.2 to v5.3, simply add fatalInjury: true under playerDamage. A configuration example has been provided below.
翻译： 在 playerDamage 项中新增了 fatalInjury 开关(默认为关闭)，它不会阻止致命伤害(如: 高空坠落，使/kill，等)。 注意： 1. 如果您不需要使用 fatalInjury 功能您可以忽略本次更新或者更新什么也不做！ 2. 如果是从 v5.2 升级到 v5.3 版本的请在 playerDamage 中添加 fatalInjur: true 即可，相应设立以放在底下。
2026/01/15/18:01:59 Optimization and addition of new features!
2026/01/16/08:21:55 Optimization and addition of new features!

2026/01/18/10:14:17 Fix and optimize!
Fix - the issue with infoPeriod in config.yml not being calculated in seconds. Optimization - Windows 11's CMD line spacing issue. Optimization - The parameters autoReloadError, autoReloadCreate, autoReloadChange, and autoReloadDelete for the language module {0} are recommended to be removed. You can also directly delete the entire language folder to regenerate the configuration files. Optimization - Fixed the issue where deleting the globalRules and localRules folders during runtime would not dynamically generate configuration files.

MESSAGE.value: Fix the null pointer error occurring when the plugin starts!

Fixed the issue where the itemDrop configuration item for radius was ineffective. Radius now allows configuring multiple coordinates in the same world, so the same rules can be applied to multiple coordinates. Warning: After the update, you must update the xyz configuration item in your radius.yml. An example configuration is shown below, or you can delete the entire radius.yml file.
修复了 radius 的 itemDrop 配置项目失效问题。 新增了 radius 同一个世界可以配置多个坐标了，这样相同的规则可以应用到多个坐标当中。 警告：更新后您必须要更新你的 radius.yml 中的 xyz 配置项，配置示例如下，当然你也可以直接删除整个radius.yml的文件。

2025/07/24/22/34/15
Major Update: WorldRulesManage 5.0 Updating to this version requires deleting the previous configuration files and regenerating them. Now supports customizing messages for each world's rules individually. A new option to block entity spawning has been added to the global rules. World-level global rules now support always keeping the weather clear. Finally, the core logic has been optimized.
重大更新 WorldRulesManage-5.0，更新此版本需要删除之前版本的配置文件重新生成。 现在支持给每个世界的规则单独配置提示信息，全局规则中加入了阻止实体生成的选项，世界全局规则中加入了始终天气为晴天，最后优化了核心逻辑。

2025/07/27/01/28/59
Kind Reminder: If version 5.0 already meets the needs of your server, you may ignore this update! WorldRulesManage v5.1 adds support for using whitelist/blacklist in blockBreak and blockPlace to restrict the breaking and placing of specific blocks. Additionally, you will need to update the blockBreak and blockPlace sections in your configuration file. A configuration example has been provided in the update log.
温馨提示：如果v5.0版本已经满足了您的服务器需求，可以忽略本次更新！ WorldRulesManage v5.1 更新了 blockBreak 和 blockPlace 可以使用黑白名单阻止特定方块破坏以及放置，此外您还需要更新配置文件的blockBreak 和 blockPlace配置项，配置示例我已放在更新日志中。

2025/08/21/03:00:15
WorldRulesManage v5.2 — Fixed the error with the itemPickup rule!
WorldRulesManage V5.2 版本修复，itemPickup规则的报错！

2025/08/24/05:02:35
A new fatalInjury option has been added under playerDamage (default: disabled). It does not prevent fatal damage (e.g., falling from a great height, /kill, etc.).
Note: If you do not need the fatalInjury feature, you can ignore this update or update without making any changes. If you are upgrading from v5.2 to v5.3, simply add fatalInjury: true under playerDamage. A configuration example has been provided below.
翻译： 在 playerDamage 项中新增了 fatalInjury 开关(默认为关闭)，它不会阻止致命伤害(如: 高空坠落，使/kill，等)。 注意： 1. 如果您不需要使用 fatalInjury 功能您可以忽略本次更新或者更新什么也不做！ 2. 如果是从 v5.2 升级到 v5.3 版本的请在 playerDamage 中添加 fatalInjur: true 即可，相应设立以放在底下。

Optimization - Fixed the issue where deleting the globalRules and localRules folders during runtime would not dynamically generate configuration files.

Fix - the issue with infoPeriod in config.yml not being calculated in seconds. Optimization - Windows 11's CMD line spacing issue. Optimization - The parameters autoReloadError, autoReloadCreate, autoReloadChange, and autoReloadDelete for the language module {0} are recommended to be removed.
